Rendition on record: http://reclinejs.com/app/?url=http://datahub.io/api/data/ac5a28ea-eb52-4b0a-a399-5dcc1becf9d9&backend=elasticsearch#explore

http://okfnlabs.org/recline/app/?url=http://data.london.gov.uk/datafiles/health/mortality-gender-borough.csv&backend=dataproxy&view-graph={%22group%22:%22Area%22,%22series%22:[%22Number%20of%20deaths%22],%22graphType%22:%22bars%22}&query={%22size%22:33,%22from%22:0}&currentView=graph

http://datahub.io/dataset/crime-data-sf/resource/897c3131-ff48-4281-ae0d-f65b6f3f9fe2
http://datahub.io/api/data/897c3131-ff48-4281-ae0d-f65b6f3f9fe2

http://localhost:9200/tmp/sfpd-last-month

London transport

http://data.london.gov.uk/datafiles/transport/tfl_passengers.csv
